attributes.action: make the recently announced inquiry into the war in Iraq completely public, except where this could do real harm to national security.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This inquiry should be public. It should have the power to compel witnesses to attend and testify under oath. It shoul examine the whole shebang, from the events leading up to the war, the conduct of the war and the handling of the aftermath. Also let the inquiry leaders examine anything else they consider relevant. The inquiry should also make recommendations as to future conduct of parliament.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
